content: WHAT KIND OF BEINGS ARE THESE JEWS IN THE ROGUE STATE UNDER THE PM THUG? MEERKATS WITH SAVAGE EDUCATION?By Aviroce However hateful to see humans suffering from war crimes, suffering from discrimination, suffering from ethnic cleansing, suffering from acts of subversion, sabotage, espionage, deception and propaganda. However ugly to humanity they are, I do not see Western Countries raising any eyebrow on crimes committed against Palestinians, Arabs and Muslims. Why? Because they are the source of these crimes. Western Countries are the source of these crimes for greed, Greed, GREED. How about the Head Rabbi for the Supreme Court of the Rogue State who sanctified that raping Palestinian Girls is allowed By Yahwah/HaShem god of the jews? In one news report I saw three israel savages soldiers hold a ten year old Palestinian Girl by her arms leading her to their compound. It is well-known that jews would force-feed gasoline to a Palestinian Child and ignite him to blow up and out. I saw his charred body with his intestines over his body. I also saw the picture of a Palestinian Child beaten on the head with blunt objects until his brain spilled out next to his head on the ground. How about a Palestinian Man shot and disabled on the ground then the savages would shoot him in the head multiple times. What kind of beings these jews are? What kind of Western Countries that would look the other way? Why doesn’t the Noble Prize Committee give the Noble Prize to the Reporters who were able to Take and Smuggle These Pictures to the Outside World, outside the Rogue State under the PM Thug? Aviroce
